Entities.Name: Procedure
Entities.Definition: The name of the surgical procedure performed.

Entities.Name: Diagnosis
Entities.Definition: The name or description of the patient’s primary or secondary diagnosis.

Entities.Name: IONM Tech
Entities.Definition: Intraoperative neuromonitoring techniques used during surgery.

Entities.Name: Level
Entities.Definition: Spinal levels involved in the procedure.

Entities.Name: Bone graft
Entities.Definition: The type of bone graft material used.

Entities.Name: Intraop Imaging
Entities.Definition: Imaging modality used during the procedure.

Entities.Name: Estimated Blood Loss
Entities.Definition: Estimated volume of blood loss during the procedure.

Entities.Name: Navigation
Entities.Definition: Surgical navigation system used for alignment or screw placement.

Entities.Name: Fluid Type
Entities.Definition: Type of IV fluids administered intraoperatively.

Entities.Name: Complications
Entities.Definition: Mention of any intraoperative or postoperative complication.

Dataset.Name: Boston Children’s Hospital Spine Operative Notes
Dataset.Description: Dataset of ~16,000 de-identified operative notes related to scoliosis, annotated with 13 domain-specific entities for weakly supervised domain-adaptive NER.

AnnotationGuidelines.Description: Entity annotations were derived using weak supervision and external Spark NLP clinical NER models, followed by domain adaptation using InterDAPT. Example entities were shown with color highlights in Figure 2 but span-level gold annotations were not manually created.
